testcase.classname: Testing the search and ordering the mobile device on flipkart page
testcase.name: Verifying the ordering of ipad and placing the order
testcase.system-out: Given user opens the flipkart page..........................................passed Then user types "ipad" in the search box....................................passed When suggestions are displayed select one of them...........................passed Then on results page filter all results by the "Wi-Fi Only" filter..........passed Then select one of the results..............................................passed Then Checkout the order.....................................................passed Then Place the order........................................................passed Then Enter Random Email and Phone number....................................passed
